query: what users dislike about this product
expected_rule: top5中至少2条rating<=2，且至少1条包含明确抱怨语义（如 disappointed/irritating/does not work）

evidence.title: THIS IS GARBAGE
evidence.text: I am enjoying the other overpriced but good-smelling Agree products, but, this is just garbage. It's hard. It is like a wax candle or hard Crayon. It is worthless. There is nothing that can be done to it or with it to make it spread on ANYTHING, nevermind your delicate armpit area. I'm a moron to have bought it. They have some nerve making it. Do yourself a favor. Do not buy this. It's rubbish. I would like to give it negative stars. This is an un-star product. It's not even a product. I don't what it is. It's trash. That's what it is. This whatever it is makes me mad.

evidence.title: I just didn't have time to research best price so I let myself get ripped off
evidence.text: Much cheaper elsewhere. I just didn't have time to research best price so I let myself get ripped off. The product is great as always. The price was insanely high comparatively. Again however. The product is as always great. Been using it for years..

evidence.title: Overpriced and no result
evidence.text: The packaging is cute and it’s easy to use. It feels good when I apply it. But there’s really no result from using it. The price is very high and I wouldn’t buy it again

evidence.title: Disappointed
evidence.text: I was incredibly excited to try this product, however after about 6 weeks of using it daily my complexion has not approved at all. It also has a smell that makes me nauseous.

evidence.title: not using it as I would like. No LOVE to, but I can't afford to use it regularly. Sad 4 me.
evidence.text:
This cream is wonderful. The awesome scent is a big favorite of mine. It's perfect . Almost. while the pricing is affordable for me, but it's small small tube. I went thru one and in less than a month, maybe, I had to reorder.
Bottom line is I'm not using it as much as I would like. No LOVE to, but I can't afford to use it regularly. Sad 4 me.
UPDATE: This went to a very reasonable price of $7.50 and wish I had bought a few extra! because as it the case in EVERYTHING lately, that I purchase, the product either is NOT available or the Price is INCREASED. almost every time... Amazon!! I guess you may not control these things - such as availability and pricing, but I will lease this message for YOU and for the vendor because when this happens I will NOT be a return customer. This is so discouraging, and it's like I am sorry but if you want return customers then stick to what the product is worth. it's a very very tiny tube! so at seven dollars, okay, but now immediately you increase by two dollars, I just WILL NOT buy from you.
please at least create a system for return purchasers... I just bought this month, just received last week and you have UPPed the price by $2! geesh!!! plus it says that I purchased three times including this one last week.

evidence.title: Not happy
evidence.text: Its not unlike any run of the mill lipstick.  Its just lipstick, not a lip “tint which should go on sheer with a hint of color.  Based on all the wonderful reviews I ordered  3 colors and don’t like any of them....oh well...lesson learned.

evidence.title: ... a huge fan of all things beauty and I love all things beauty
evidence.text: I am a huge fan of all things beauty and I love all things beauty. I believe that there is no such thing as too many of something. I really love facial masks and I love this one too. It's great it's not to watery, it's not to thick, it's just perfect. It goes on smooth and it doesn't irritate my skin. I enjoyed testing out this product. This is a product that I'd gladly purchase again. I am a satisfied happy customer. I was given the opportunity to purchase this product at a discounted price in exchange for my unbiased review.

evidence.title: Beautiful
evidence.text: These are just beautiful and for me they have lasted several day.  Expensive for 6 tho.

evidence.title: Pretty scent long lasting!
evidence.text:
This is a lovely smelling perfume smells just like Juicy! It lasts a very long time just about as long as juicy does and it does not have an over bearing scent like some perfumes it comes in a good sized bottle that will last me for quite a while! Very happy with this purchase will buy again and will also try other scents form Watermark Beauty!

The discount has not influenced or impacted my judgement of this product. I take this seriously and include my own opinion and experience with each product I review. I am in no way required by the seller to leave positive remarks about their product. If you have found my product review to be helpful, please thumbs up this review. This will make it easier for others to find this review so they may be helped as well.

evidence.title: Affordable, average mascara
evidence.text: Reviews when I ordered this were raving about it. It's not bad, but it's not all that. Many more reviews have been added since then that reflect that.

query: is this product good for sensitive skin
expected_rule: top5中至少2条提到 sensitive skin 或刺激反应相关文本

evidence.title: Calms Stressed, Sensitive Skin
evidence.text:
When skin is stressed, every little thing bothers it. Too much heat, too much cold, too much wind, too much dry air.
Those of us with sensitive skin know exactly what stressed out skin is. We need something that will soothe, without any irritation.
This particular cream hit that goal for me. I used it during a rosacea flare up, to help the redness and discomfort calm down. It worked very well. Not a miracle, but it worked well.
If you have skin like mine, I hope it works for you.

evidence.title: Great for sensitive skin
evidence.text: I got these because they have aloe vera.  I have sensitive skin and these do a nice job of gentle cleaning, low odor with no ill effects.  They are also nice and portable as I can put them in my bag when I travel.

evidence.title: I love this product.
evidence.text: It makes your skin feel so soft. I use it on my hands too. It's only $9.99 so don't buy it here ask a friend to get you some if you don't live near a TJ's bc it's not worth the $26+ pricetag. I have sensitive skin and it works well for me. In the summer I just use it without anything else.

evidence.title: Immediately soothing and caused no redness or irritation
evidence.text: I have found my skin has become more sensitive in my 40s and with all the additional washing and bathing because of Covid 19.  I'm new to this brand but found this Cica cream to work very well. It immediately cooled and soothed my irritated skin without any greasiness or oiliness. It was quickly absorbed into the skin.  It left my skin feeling much softer, less irritated, soothed. It is something I plan to keep on hand.

evidence.title: Gentle effective cleanser that targets sensitive skin
evidence.text:
My skin has become more sensitive over time and the cold weather and dry air during winter exacerbates the condition. This Easydew Starter Cleansing Milk works very gently and is effective at cleaning. My skin doesn't feel stripped or dry and the ceramides increase hydration so that my skin feels soft after cleansing even without toner or moisturizer.
I have sensitive skin and the cleanser did not cause redness or irritation or sensitivity.

query: how long does the scent last
expected_rule: top5中至少2条讨论 lasting/longevity/smell duration

evidence.title: 3 stars
evidence.text: This perfume smells really good and I love the presentation of it. However, after about 15 minutes... you can’t smell it at all... if you can keep spraying it then it would be great.

evidence.title: Clean, freshbscent
evidence.text: Smells like something a barber would use. Just a good, clean scent to use daily. Longevity wise, it will last about 4-5 hours on skin and about 6-8 hours in clothes. If you sweat a great deal, maybe try another product.

evidence.title: Nice strong scent at first, but it disappears very quickly.
evidence.text:
I really loved the idea of this Boiess Baby Cologne "Les Enfants" in White Blossom, and thought it would be perfect for myself since I don't like loud fragrances. The description of the scent profile really enticed me, as I love all of the notes. I was able to try both the White Blossom and the Lavanda scents.
Both of the "Cologne" sprays smell identical to me. I can't say that I can tell them apart at all. They both have a very strong earthy, herbal, slightly floral scent that is heavily ladened with alcohol upon spraying. It stays very strong for several minutes, but then starts to dry down.
Sadly, once it dries down, the scent pretty much dissipates. If I don't spray it heavily at first, which is too much for my asthma to handle, the scent just goes away completely. I must spray it on me again. Once I spray it on a few times over an hour or so, I can smell the ever so slightest hint of it on my clothing later, if I put my nose right on it. That is a lot of spraying for very little payoff.
I know this is meant for kids mostly, but I would think the scent would and should last longer. Sure, my grandsons will like using it, maybe, as it is quite strong at first. But, I think it would just be more for the fun of it and very short lived. This is also very expensive "Cologne" to not be able to smell it after 30 minutes, and right at $28 is too expensive for me to buy just for the fun of it.  
For others this "Baby Cologne" may be something wonderful or maybe they can smell it more than I can. As I said, I really love the idea of a light fragrance, but not for babies. I do wish the scent stuck around more for me.

evidence.title: Very strong scent at first, but it disappears very quickly.
evidence.text:
I really loved the idea of this Boiess Baby Cologne "Les Enfants" in White Blossom. Not because I think it is a good idea for a baby, because boy, is it not. I actually thought it would be perfect for myself since I don't like loud fragrances. The description of the scent profile really enticed me, as I love all of the notes. I was able to try both the Lavanda and the White Blossom scents.
Both of the "Cologne" sprays smell identical to me. I can't say that I can tell them apart at all. They both have a very strong earthy, herbal, slightly floral scent that is heavily ladened with alcohol upon spraying. It stays very strong for several minutes, but then starts to dry down.
Sadly, once it dries down, the scent pretty much dissipates. If I don't spray it heavily at first, which is too much for my asthma to handle, much less any baby, the scent just goes away completely. I must spray it on me again. If I spray it on a few times over an hour or so, I can smell the ever so slightest hint of it on my clothing later, if I put my nose right on it. That is a lot of spraying for very little payoff.
I know this is meant for kids mostly, but I would think the scent would and should last longer. Sure, my grandsons will like using it, maybe or not, as it is quite strong at first. But, I think it would just be more for the fun of it and very short lived. This is also very expensive "Cologne" to not be able to smell it after 30 minutes, and right at $28 is too expensive for me to buy just for the fun of it.  
For others this "Baby Cologne" may be something wonderful or maybe they can smell it more than I can. As I said, I really love the idea of a light fragrance, but not for babies. I do wish the scent stuck around more for me.

query: does this product feel greasy on skin
expected_rule: top5中至少2条讨论 texture/oily/greasy/weightless 感受

evidence.title: Exfoliates and doesn't feel greasy
evidence.text: I like the scent of coconut but was a little worried that the scrub would feel greasy on the skin.  It was comfortable and left my skin feeling softer without feeling dry or oily.  The scrub has large salt granules and these are slow to dissolve, I like this better than a sugar scrub.

evidence.title: Non-Greasy
evidence.text: I apply body lotion every morning and night. This one is a thinner lotion than some, but it absorbs quickly. My skin just drinks it up! It's non-greasy and has a light, pleasant scent to it. The bottle is a little oddly shaped. It's thin and flat which makes it a little difficult to grip in my opinion.

evidence.title: Made my face feel greasy
evidence.text:
I really wanted to like this facial serum. It comes in a little dropper bottle that is common for this kind of product. The serum is a prickly pear oil that is supposed to be very good for your face.

When you use it you will first notice the fragrance of the oil. I am not sure if maybe my bottle went bad, but mine just smelled very bad, almost like oil that went rancid. I really didn’t like it at all and it makes it difficult using this product especially since that smell lingered for some time on top of it.

The oil is on the lighter side, and even so it took a while to absorb and my skin felt greasy for some time. I would not recommend using this during the day. Especially when wearing a mask, using a facial oil that leaves an oily residue makes my face very hot and sweaty, just awful and this one would do exactly that. Sadly this one is just average at best and I will not be re-purchasing when I run out.

evidence.title: Left my face greasy and was completely scentless
evidence.text:
This is a very expensive facial oil at $79. It comes in a dark glass bottle to protect the oil inside from light from degradation. The oil itself is applied using a dropper like most really. It is completely scentless which is disappointing but will work well for people sensitive to scents.

They claim that it will not leave you with a greasy after feel, well I am not sure what they are talking about. It absorbs quickly but I definitely had a greasy residue on my skin and that stuck with me. I would recommend using this in the evenings only because of this. You wouldn't want to wear a face mask with this greasy feel on your face. You already sweat a lot in those masks and this would make you feel even worse in them. As an overnight moisturizing treatment this does work well though.

But would I repurchase at this price? No way, there are other much nice products out there especially at that price.

evidence.title: Very moisturizing, but not greasy!
evidence.text:
This 4 pack of travel lotions by Spanature is super nice, from the presentation of the product, to the performance of the product. They come packaged soooo nicely in 4 little gift boxes, so they are perfect for gift giving. Also, the tubes are the perfect size to fit in your purse- so they are great for on the go or even traveling!

The lotion itself is very moisturizing, and not greasy at all. The green tea scent is not strong at all, which is perfect if you are sensitive to strong scents.

query: what do users say about irritation or allergy
expected_rule: top5中应包含 irritation/allergy/breakout 等风险反馈

evidence.title: Burns like my latex allergy
evidence.text: Sensitive skin? Beware of Lume! I haven't used it in a week and I am still hurting from when I did use it.

evidence.title: This Gave Me a Migraine More Than Once
evidence.text: This is an okay cleanser but it feels like I’m washing my face with lotion so my face doesn’t feel clean at all. And there is too much of a good thing here regarding the scent, it’s nice but way too strong and the few times that I used this I actually got a migraine from it. I had to be sure it was because of the scent so I used it a few more times and yes it’s the scent, it gives me a big ole migraine. What on earth does that say about the health of this product. Not good that’s for sure.

evidence.title: Itchy as all hell
evidence.text: So itchy that I return it

evidence.title: Rash
evidence.text: I'm bummed, because this seems to be working (eyelashes are way softer and less brittle), but it gave me a rash on my eyelids. I have lupus, and my skin is really sensitive, so this probably won't happen to you.

evidence.title: Caution!!
evidence.text: I put this on in the morning before my 16 hour shift and within a few hours I could feel irritation in my armpits. It got worse over the day and by the time I was done working my armpits were red and swollen. The only positive was the scent, the lavender smelled really good and strong and I didn't stink at the end of my shift.

expected_rule: top5中应有可支持购买判断的证据（质量/效果/缺点）

evidence.title: Really does make a difference....
evidence.text: Works smoothly and makes the face and neck feel like it’s had a facial!  That stimulation does give the skin a healthy glow, and makes you feel really clean.  Have been using it for two weeks - a couple times a week, and there is a difference in the softness of my aging skin.  No more dry skin flakes - so it’s exfoliating and exposing fresh-looking skin.  Never had one before - but now, I’m a fan!

evidence.title: Very Good but Pricey
evidence.text: This is a little jar of face cream for $27.98 (the price as of this review).  It feels good on my facial skin, but honestly, it doesn't moisturize it any better than many less expensive creams I've used and reviewed.  It's good, but I just don't see why it costs so much money.  The texture is close to that of sour cream and it's easy to apply.  It's a little greasy for a short while until it gets absorbed.

evidence.title: Pricey but Decent
evidence.text: This has worked pretty well for me over the past couple weeks of use, but I can’t say it’s worked better than products that cost half the price. It’s a good moisturizer, but it’s overpriced.

evidence.title: Great at the price point
evidence.text: It's not the best I've ever used, but at the price point it's good. The main thing is to be careful not to use too much at first as it takes very little. That took some adjusting to. I might stick with this one for a while. It's pretty good.

evidence.title: Worth it
evidence.text: First time using a gel UV light and I am surprised at how easy it was to use. It comes with 4 different settings and definitely made things easier & quick way to get nails done.

query: what are the most frequent drawbacks
expected_rule: top5中应覆盖重复出现的缺点线索，不应只返回泛泛好评

evidence.title: Cheap, flimsy, cosmetic bag that has limited hanging options and is not worth consideration in my opinion
evidence.text:
I am sorry I ordered this bag and am very disappointed. It's cheap, flimsy, and holds light items. Items have a tendency of tilting outward in the pockets depending on the size of the item and are at risk of falling out. The detachable clear plastic tote at the bottom is a nice touch, but that is about it. The zippers are sticky.

In my opinion this cosmetic / travel organizer will not last at all. My biggest complaint is the hook for hanging. It is not a full-size hanger hook so there are a limited number of places to hang this. It can be hung on a wire shelf with holes (like a shower caddy or closet with wire inserts) but it does not hang on a shower rod or on a closet rod or any rod much thicker than a finger.

This cosmetic bag is not even worth consideration in my opinion.

evidence.title: Don’t waste your money, bristles fall out very fast!
evidence.text: I received this brush on a Monday, and used it just 4 times. First use I was a little surprised at the amount of bristles that came out but figured, it’s the first use... maybe there were a few loose pieces from manufacturing. Over the course of the week every use yields in dozens of bristles coming out, all over my bathroom or shower floor. I have used it for dry brushing, and the other times in the shower with body wash. After the 4th use it appears all the bristles have already fallen out of one hole, and many other spaces are losing the bristles fast. Really disappointed in this and to be honest I should have paid a dollar for this quality. Don’t waste your money or another second considering this awful product.

evidence.title: Perfect for little things...I'm not throwing away half used products and filling up landfills!!
evidence.text:
I have dry eyes, and these work great for using saline solution to clean around my eyes everyday several times. They're thin and soft, and just the right size, so that I don't feel like I'm wasting a large cotton round. I also use them to go over my face with witch hazel, after my nightly facial cleansing. It only takes one for each task. I haven't had any problems with them falling apart or being too thin for my needs. Using them for my purposes, the three pack has & will last me for a pretty long time.
It's nice to find the right size product for the right size need that I have. I highly recommend these to anyone who has light duty needs for cotton rounds, and doesn't want to feel like they're wasting money, and throwing away the majority of a product, because it was just too large for what they needed it for. We have enough trash in landfills.

evidence.title: Calling this "Virtually indestructible" should be a crime.
evidence.text: I've had this model trimmer for about 2 years now.  At first, it was pretty good value for light trimming.  But the trimmer guard is a flimsy plastic piece that easily breaks and it's difficult to find a replacement trimmer guard (no results from the Remington website) for this model.  As well, the NiMH battery is pretty pathetic, not only short lasting when it is brand new and fully-charged, but NiMH battery tech has a terrible lifespan.  Why any manufacturer would use it in this day and age baffles me. Unless it was about planned obsolescence all along. Overall, this is an attractive product for light trimming and delivers somewhat, for awhile, until one of the cheap components fails and you have to buy another because the battery is not replaceable nor is the guard made to last.

evidence.title: Not effective enough as some other skincare products
evidence.text:
MD Complete Bright & Healthy Citrus-C Refresh Retinol + Vitamin C Multitasking Treatment

My wife got this multitasking treatment of vitamin C and retinol, to combat uneven skin texture and fine lines. She used it for a while and afterward said that at least for her skin, she didn’t notice that much of a difference. There was some brightening, but not effective enough as some other skincare products that she’s tried. Overall, it may be good with those with minor skin issues, or maintaining good skin, but not if there’s a skin issue that is trying to be reversed.
